text: Towers of Silence () is a 1952 West German adventure film directed by Hans Bertram and starring Philip Dorn, Gisela Uhlen, and Carl Raddatz. The film's sets were designed by Max Mellin. It was shot on location in Amsterdam, Damascus and Palmyra. ==Cast== ==References == == Bibliography == * == External links == * Category:1952 films Category:1952 adventure films Category:German adventure films Category:West German films Category:German- language films Category:Films directed by Hans Bertram Category:Films set in Syria Category:Treasure hunt films
title: Towers of Silence (film)
